title.value: Влияние препарата Поливисол на гематологические и биохимические показатели кроликов
Influence of preparation Polivisol on rabbit's haematological and biochemical parameters

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Kuchinski, M.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was studied the influence of the veterinary drug Polivisol on the hematological indexes and biochemical blood profile of rabbits after its frequent administration. The experiomental preparation with the operating name Polivisol is an infusion solution developed for the correction of conditions accompanied with intoxication, dehydration, hypovolaemia, and metabolic acidosis. Its compositions includes: low-molecular polyvinyl pyrrolidone, sodium chloride, calcium chloride, magnesium chloride, sodium acetate, potassium acetate. The obtained experimental results showed that the hematological changes stated in the experimemtal rabbits after the intravenous administration of Polivisol in dose 30 gram/kg had the temporary character. Hematological and biochemistry changes in rabbits during 14 day's infusion of povidon containing detoxifying solution were investigated. It has been found, that hematological changes were transient and caused by reduction of plasma osmolality. Long-term infusions do not affect functioning of liver, kidneys and metabolism of lipids, proteins and carbohydrates.
